_source.productName: Centre Stage Dance Company presents That's Entertainment 2025
_source.productDescription: Centre Stage Dance Company proudly presents "That's Entertainment 2025" featuring their talented dancers from ages 2-18 years. Step into the magic of the season as we journey to find the Christmas Star and help Santa on his way. If Christmas fills your heart with joy, you won't want to miss our 1st half festive celebration. The excitement continues in our 2nd half with a spectacular showcase of brand-new group routines across every style - Jazz, Tap, Hip Hop, Boys Hip Hop, Contemporary, Ballet and dazzling showgirls. Featuring performers of all ages and no solos, the 2nd half is a true celebration of teamwork, talent and every individual dancer. Come along, sit back, relax and enjoy our Show!
_source.productShortDescription: Make your experience complete and enjoy one of our delicious boxes.

productComments.commentText: Centre Stage Dance Company proudly presents "That's Entertainment 2025" featuring their talented dancers from ages 2-18 years. Step into the magic of the season as we journey to find the Christmas Star and help Santa on his way. If Christmas fills your heart with joy, you won't want to miss our 1st half festive celebration. The excitement continues in our 2nd half with a spectacular showcase of brand-new group routines across every style - Jazz, Tap, Hip Hop, Boys Hip Hop, Contemporary, Ballet and dazzling showgirls. Featuring performers of all ages and no solos, the 2nd half is a true celebration of teamwork, talent and every individual dancer. Come along, sit back, relax and enjoy our Show!

中央舞台舞蹈团荣幸呈现“这就是娱乐2025”，汇聚2至18岁才华横溢的舞者。踏入这个充满魔力的季节，我们将踏上寻找圣诞星的旅程，帮助圣诞老人踏上旅程。如果您心中充满圣诞喜悦，千万不要错过我们上半场的节日庆典。下半场精彩依旧，我们将带来各种风格的全新团体舞表演，包括爵士舞、踢踏舞、嘻哈舞、男孩嘻哈舞、现代舞、芭蕾以及令人眼花缭乱的歌舞女郎。下半场的表演者年龄跨度广，没有独舞，是团队合作、才华横溢和每位舞者个人魅力的真正体现。快来加入我们，放松身心，欣赏我们的演出吧！

La Centre Stage Dance Company est fière de présenter « That's Entertainment 2025 », avec ses talentueux danseurs âgés de 2 à 18 ans. Plongez dans la magie des fêtes de fin d'année et partez à la recherche de l'Étoile de Noël et aidez le Père Noël sur son chemin. Si Noël vous remplit de joie, ne manquez pas notre première partie festive. L'excitation se poursuit lors de notre deuxième partie avec un spectacle spectaculaire de nouvelles chorégraphies de groupe dans tous les styles : jazz, claquettes, hip-hop, hip-hop masculin, contemporain, ballet et des danseuses éblouissantes. Avec des artistes de tous âges et sans solos, cette deuxième partie est une véritable célébration du travail d'équipe, du talent et de chaque danseur. Venez, installez-vous confortablement, détendez-vous et profitez de notre spectacle !

La Centre Stage Dance Company è orgogliosa di presentare "That's Entertainment 2025" con i suoi talentuosi ballerini dai 2 ai 18 anni. Immergetevi nella magia del Natale mentre viaggiamo alla ricerca della Stella di Natale e aiutiamo Babbo Natale nel suo cammino. Se il Natale vi riempie il cuore di gioia, non vorrete perdervi la nostra prima parte dello spettacolo. L'entusiasmo continua nella seconda parte con una spettacolare esibizione di nuovissime coreografie di gruppo in ogni stile: Jazz, Tap, Hip Hop, Hip Hop maschile, Contemporaneo, Balletto e splendide showgirl. Con artisti di tutte le età e senza assoli, la seconda parte è una vera celebrazione del lavoro di squadra, del talento e di ogni singolo ballerino. Venite, sedetevi, rilassatevi e godetevi il nostro spettacolo!

Centre Stage Dance Company se enorgullece de presentar "Eso es Entretenimiento 2025" con sus talentosos bailarines de 2 a 18 años. Sumérgete en la magia de la temporada mientras viajamos en busca de la Estrella de Navidad y ayudamos a Papá Noel en su camino. Si la Navidad te llena de alegría, no te pierdas nuestra primera mitad de celebración festiva. La emoción continúa en la segunda mitad con una espectacular muestra de nuevas rutinas grupales de todos los estilos: jazz, tap, hip hop, hip hop masculino, contemporáneo, ballet y deslumbrantes bailarinas. Con artistas de todas las edades y sin solistas, la segunda mitad es una verdadera celebración del trabajo en equipo, el talento y la individualidad de cada bailarín. ¡Ven, siéntate, relájate y disfruta de nuestro espectáculo!

Centre Stage Dance Company dengan bangga mempersembahkan "That's Entertainment 2025" yang menampilkan penari-penari berbakat mereka dari usia 2-18 tahun. Masuki keajaiban musim ini saat kita bertualang mencari Bintang Natal dan membantu Sinterklas dalam perjalanannya. Jika Natal memenuhi hati Anda dengan sukacita, jangan lewatkan perayaan meriah paruh pertama kami. Kemeriahan berlanjut di paruh kedua dengan pertunjukan spektakuler dari berbagai rutinitas grup baru dari berbagai gaya - Jazz, Tap, Hip Hop, Hip Hop Anak Laki-laki, Kontemporer, Balet, dan para penari wanita yang memukau. Menampilkan penampil dari segala usia dan tanpa solo, paruh kedua ini merupakan perayaan sejati atas kerja sama tim, bakat, dan setiap individu penari. Ayo, duduk, bersantai, dan nikmati Pertunjukan kami!

Die Centre Stage Dance Company präsentiert stolz „That's Entertainment 2025“ mit ihren talentierten Tänzern im Alter von 2 bis 18 Jahren. Tauchen Sie ein in die Magie der Feiertage, während wir uns auf die Suche nach dem Weihnachtsstern machen und dem Weihnachtsmann auf seinem Weg helfen. Wenn Weihnachten Ihr Herz mit Freude erfüllt, sollten Sie sich unsere festliche Feier in der 1. Hälfte nicht entgehen lassen. Die Aufregung geht in unserer 2. Hälfte weiter mit einer spektakulären Präsentation brandneuer Gruppenroutinen aus allen Stilrichtungen – Jazz, Stepp, Hip-Hop, Boys Hip-Hop, Contemporary, Ballett und umwerfenden Showgirls. Mit Künstlern jeden Alters und ohne Solos ist die 2. Hälfte eine wahre Feier von Teamwork, Talent und jedem einzelnen Tänzer. Kommen Sie vorbei, lehnen Sie sich zurück, entspannen Sie sich und genießen Sie unsere Show!

A Centre Stage Dance Company tem o orgulho de apresentar "That's Entertainment 2025", com seus talentosos dançarinos de 2 a 18 anos. Entre na magia da temporada enquanto viajamos em busca da Estrela de Natal e ajudamos o Papai Noel em sua jornada. Se o Natal enche seu coração de alegria, você não vai querer perder nossa primeira metade da celebração festiva. A emoção continua na segunda metade com uma apresentação espetacular de novas rotinas de grupo em todos os estilos: jazz, sapateado, hip hop, hip hop masculino, dança contemporânea, balé e deslumbrantes dançarinas. Com artistas de todas as idades e sem solos, a segunda metade é uma verdadeira celebração do trabalho em equipe, do talento e de cada dançarino individualmente. Venha, sente-se, relaxe e aproveite nosso show!

センターステージ・ダンスカンパニーが、2歳から18歳までの才能あふれるダンサーたちをフィーチャーした「That's Entertainment 2025」を誇りを持ってお届けします。クリスマスの魔法の世界に足を踏み入れ、サンタクロースを助けてクリスマスの星を探しに旅に出ましょう。クリスマスがあなたの心を喜びで満たすなら、前半の華やかな祝祭をお見逃しなく。後半も興奮は続き、ジャズ、タップ、ヒップホップ、ボーイズヒップホップ、コンテンポラリー、バレエ、そして華麗なショーガールたちなど、あらゆるスタイルの最新のグループルーティンを華麗に披露します。あらゆる年齢層のパフォーマーが出演し、ソロパートのない後半は、チームワーク、才能、そして一人ひとりのダンサーの真髄を体現する、真の祝祭です。ぜひお越しいただき、ゆったりとくつろぎながら、私たちのショーをお楽しみください！

中央舞台舞蹈團榮幸呈現“這就是娛樂2025”，匯聚2至18歲才華橫溢的舞者。踏入這個充滿魔法的季節，我們將踏上尋找聖誕星星的旅程，幫助聖誕老人踏上旅程。如果您心中充滿聖誕喜悅，千萬不要錯過我們上半場的節日慶典。下半場精彩依舊，我們將帶來各種風格的全新團體舞表演，包括爵士舞、踢踏舞、嘻哈舞、男孩嘻哈舞、現代舞、芭蕾以及令人眼花繚亂的歌舞女郎。下半場的表演者年齡跨度廣，沒有獨舞，是團隊合作、才華橫溢和每位舞者個人魅力的真正體現。快來加入我們，放鬆身心，欣賞我們的表演吧！

센터 스테이지 댄스 컴퍼니(Centre Stage Dance Company)가 2세부터 18세까지 재능 있는 댄서들을 선보이는 "That's Entertainment 2025"를 자랑스럽게 선보입니다. 크리스마스 별을 찾아 산타클로스를 돕는 여정을 떠나는 마법 같은 크리스마스 시즌 속으로 빠져보세요. 크리스마스가 여러분의 마음을 기쁨으로 가득 채운다면 저희의 전반부 축제를 놓치지 마세요. 후반부에서는 재즈 탭댄스 힙합 보이 힙합 컨템포러리 발레 그리고 눈부신 쇼걸까지 모든 스타일의 새로운 그룹 댄스를 선보이며 그 열기는 계속됩니다. 모든 연령대의 공연자들이 솔로 없이 함께하는 후반부는 팀워크 재능 그리고 모든 댄서의 개성을 진정으로 기념하는 자리입니다. 오셔서 편안히 앉아 저희 공연을 즐겨보세요!

_source.productDescription:
Redlands Sings! is a free event and back by popular demand! Join a joyful festive sing-along!
Join multi-award-winning singer and conductor Jonathon Welch AM and his fabulous Play It Forward Redlands choirs for a joyous hour of festive fun singing all your favourite Christmas classics — Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells and more!

Don't miss this feel-good, high-energy community event that captures the true spirit of Christmas — togetherness, music and joy.

No experience needed — just bring your voice, your family and your festive cheer!

This event is free and suitable for all ages!

Registrations are essential. For bookings of 5 or more, please book through the RPAC Box Office by calling them.
_source.productShortDescription: Join multi-award-winning singer and conductor Jonathon Welch AM and his fabulous Play It Forward Redlands choirs for a joyous hour of festive fun

productComments.commentText:
Redlands Sings! is a free event and back by popular demand! Join a joyful festive sing-along!
Join multi-award-winning singer and conductor Jonathon Welch AM and his fabulous Play It Forward Redlands choirs for a joyous hour of festive fun singing all your favourite Christmas classics — Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells and more!

Don't miss this feel-good, high-energy community event that captures the true spirit of Christmas — togetherness, music and joy.

No experience needed — just bring your voice, your family and your festive cheer!

This event is free and suitable for all ages!

Registrations are essential. For bookings of 5 or more, please book through the RPAC Box Office by calling them.

「雷德蘭茲之歌！」是一項免費活動，應廣大樂迷的強烈要求再次回歸！快來加入我們，一起歡唱節日歌曲吧！

與屢獲殊榮的歌手兼指揮家喬納森·韋爾奇 (Jonathon Welch AM) 和他才華橫溢的“Play It Forward”雷德蘭茲合唱團一起，歡唱一小時，盡情享受節日的歡樂！我們將演唱所有您最愛的聖誕經典歌曲——《裝飾大廳》(Deck the Halls)、《紅鼻子馴鹿魯道夫》(Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer)、《平安夜》(Silent Night)、《鈴兒響叮噹》(Jingle Bells) 等等！

千萬不要錯過這場充滿活力、令人愉悅的社區活動，它將帶您感受聖誕節的真諦——團聚、音樂和歡樂。

無需任何經驗——只需帶上您的歌喉、家人和節日的喜悅！

本次活動免費，老少咸宜！

請務必提前註冊。 5人以上團體預訂，請致電雷德蘭茲表演藝術中心 (RPAC) 售票處進行預訂。

Redlands Sings! adalah acara gratis dan kembali lagi atas permintaan banyak orang! Bergabunglah dengan acara bernyanyi bersama yang meriah!
Bergabunglah dengan penyanyi dan konduktor peraih banyak penghargaan, Jonathon Welch AM, dan paduan suara Play It Forward Redlands-nya yang luar biasa untuk satu jam penuh keceriaan meriah menyanyikan semua lagu Natal favorit Anda — Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells, dan banyak lagi!

Jangan lewatkan acara komunitas yang meriah dan penuh semangat ini yang menangkap semangat Natal sejati — kebersamaan, musik, dan kegembiraan.

Tidak perlu pengalaman — cukup bawa suara Anda, keluarga Anda, dan keceriaan meriah Anda!

Acara ini gratis dan cocok untuk segala usia!

Pendaftaran sangat penting. Untuk pemesanan 5 orang atau lebih, silakan pesan melalui Loket RPAC dengan menghubungi mereka.

Redlands Sings! est un événement gratuit et de retour à la demande générale ! Venez chanter ensemble dans la joie et la magie de Noël !

Rejoignez Jonathon Welch AM, chanteur et chef d'orchestre maintes fois primé, et ses fabuleuses chorales Play It Forward Redlands pour une heure de pur bonheur festif. Au programme : tous vos classiques de Noël préférés, comme Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells et bien d'autres !

Ne manquez pas cet événement convivial et dynamique qui capture l'essence même de Noël : le partage, la musique et la joie.

Aucune expérience requise : venez simplement avec votre voix, votre famille et votre bonne humeur !

Cet événement est gratuit et ouvert à tous !

L'inscription est obligatoire. Pour les groupes de 5 personnes ou plus, veuillez réserver auprès de la billetterie du RPAC par téléphone.

Redlands Sings! è un evento gratuito e torna a grande richiesta! Partecipa a un allegro coro natalizio!
Unisciti al pluripremiato cantante e direttore d'orchestra Jonathon Welch AM e ai suoi favolosi cori Play It Forward Redlands per un'ora di gioioso divertimento natalizio cantando tutti i tuoi classici natalizi preferiti: Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells e molti altri!

Non perdere questo evento comunitario ricco di energia e benessere che cattura il vero spirito del Natale: unione, musica e gioia.

Non è richiesta alcuna esperienza: porta solo la tua voce, la tua famiglia e la tua allegria natalizia!

Questo evento è gratuito e adatto a tutte le età!

La registrazione è obbligatoria. Per prenotazioni di 5 o più persone, si prega di prenotare telefonicamente tramite la biglietteria RPAC.

Redlands Sings! ist eine kostenlose Veranstaltung und aufgrund der großen Nachfrage wieder da! Singen Sie mit uns die Weihnachtszeit! Der mehrfach preisgekrönte Sänger und Dirigent Jonathon Welch AM und seine fantastischen Play It Forward Redlands Chöre laden Sie zu einer fröhlichen Stunde voller Weihnachtslieder ein – darunter Klassiker wie „Deck the Halls“ „Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer“ „Stille Nacht“ „Jingle Bells“ und viele mehr!

Verpassen Sie nicht dieses stimmungsvolle und energiegeladene Gemeinschaftsevent, das den wahren Geist von Weihnachten einfängt: Zusammengehörigkeit, Musik und Freude.

Vorkenntnisse sind nicht erforderlich – bringen Sie einfach Ihre Stimme, Ihre Familie und gute Laune mit!

Die Veranstaltung ist kostenlos und für alle Altersgruppen geeignet!

Eine Anmeldung ist erforderlich. Für Gruppen ab 5 Personen buchen Sie bitte telefonisch über die Kasse des RPAC.

¡Redlands Sings! es un evento gratuito que regresa a petición popular. ¡Únete a un alegre y festivo canto colectivo!

Acompaña al galardonado cantante y director Jonathon Welch AM y a sus fabulosos coros Play It Forward Redlands para disfrutar de una hora llena de alegría y diversión navideña cantando tus clásicos favoritos: «Deck the Halls» «Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer» «Silent Night» «Jingle Bells» y muchos más.

No te pierdas este evento comunitario lleno de energía y buen rollo que captura el verdadero espíritu navideño: unión, música y alegría.

No necesitas experiencia; solo trae tu voz, tu familia y tu espíritu navideño.

Este evento es gratuito y apto para todas las edades.

Es imprescindible registrarse. Para grupos de 5 o más personas, reserva a través de la taquilla del RPAC llamando por teléfono.

“雷德兰兹之歌！”是一项免费活动，应广大乐迷的强烈要求再次回归！快来加入我们，一起欢唱节日歌曲吧！

与屡获殊荣的歌手兼指挥家乔纳森·韦尔奇 (Jonathon Welch AM) 和他才华横溢的“Play It Forward”雷德兰兹合唱团一起，欢唱一小时，尽情享受节日的欢乐！我们将演唱所有您最喜爱的圣诞经典歌曲——《装饰大厅》(Deck the Halls)、《红鼻子驯鹿鲁道夫》(Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer)、《平安夜》(Silent Night)、《铃儿响叮当》(Jingle Bells) 等等！

千万不要错过这场充满活力、令人愉悦的社区活动，它将带您感受圣诞节的真谛——团聚、音乐和欢乐。

无需任何经验——只需带上您的歌喉、家人和节日的喜悦！

本次活动免费，老少皆宜！

请务必提前注册。5人及以上团体预订，请致电雷德兰兹表演艺术中心 (RPAC) 售票处进行预订。

レッドランズ・シングス！は、ご要望にお応えして無料イベントとして復活！楽しいクリスマスソングを一緒に歌いましょう！
数々の賞を受賞した歌手兼指揮者のジョナサン・ウェルチAMと、彼の素晴らしいプレイ・イット・フォワード・レッドランズ合唱団が、クリスマスの定番曲を歌い上げます。「デック・ザ・ホールズ」「赤鼻のトナカイ」「きよしこの夜」「ジングルベル」など、クリスマスならではの楽しい1時間をお楽しみください！

クリスマスの真のスピリットである、一体感、音楽、そして喜びを表現した、この心温まるエネルギッシュなコミュニティイベントをお見逃しなく。

経験は問いません。あなたの歌声、ご家族、そしてクリスマスの喜びだけをお持ちください！

このイベントは無料で、全年齢対象です！

お申し込みは必須です。5名様以上のご予約は、RPACボックスオフィスまでお電話にてお申し込みください。

Redlands Sings!는 무료 행사이며 많은 분들의 성원에 힘입어 다시 돌아왔습니다! 즐거운 축제 싱어롱에 참여하세요!
수상 경력에 빛나는 가수이자 지휘자인 조나단 웰치 AM과 그의 멋진 Play It Forward Redlands 합창단과 함께 Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells 등 여러분이 가장 좋아하는 크리스마스 명곡들을 부르며 즐거운 한 시간 동안 축제 분위기를 만끽하세요!

진정한 크리스마스 정신 즉 단결 음악 그리고 기쁨을 담아낸 이 기분 좋고 에너지 넘치는 커뮤니티 행사를 놓치지 마세요.

경험은 필요 없습니다. 여러분의 목소리 가족 그리고 축제의 열기만 가져오세요!

이 행사는 무료이며 모든 연령대가 참여 가능합니다!

등록은 필수입니다. 5인 이상 예약은 RPAC 매표소로 전화하여 예약해 주세요.

Redlands Sings! é um evento gratuito e está de volta a pedido do público! Junte-se a nós para uma alegre cantoria natalina!
Participe com o premiado cantor e maestro Jonathon Welch AM e seus fabulosos coros do Play It Forward Redlands para uma hora de pura alegria e diversão cantando todos os seus clássicos de Natal favoritos — Deck the Halls, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Silent Night, Jingle Bells e muito mais!

Não perca este evento comunitário vibrante e inspirador que captura o verdadeiro espírito do Natal — união, música e alegria.

Não é necessário ter experiência — basta trazer sua voz, sua família e seu espírito natalino!

Este evento é gratuito e adequado para todas as idades!

As inscrições são essenciais. Para reservas de 5 pessoas ou mais, faça sua reserva pelo telefone da bilheteria do RPAC.

_source.productDescription:
After much anticipation, 14-time Grammy Award-winner Lady Gaga has officially announced the Australian leg of 'The MAYHEM Ball' tour, adding 3 stadium shows to her global tour.

These shows mark Lady Gaga's long-awaited return to the region, and her first dates in Australia since 2014's ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball.

Australian fans can experience 'The MAYHEM Ball' tour in Melbourne, Brisbane and Sydney - arriving at Brisbane's Suncorp Stadium on Tuesday, 9 December 2025.
_source.productShortDescription: After much anticipation, 14-time Grammy Award-winner Lady Gaga has announced the Australian leg of ‘The MAYHEM Ball’ tour.

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness
Have accessibility information and photos, including of a bathroom, room and/or floor plan on your website (can be emailed on request)
Website meets WCAG 2.0 accessibility standards
Provide assistance with booking arrangements (includes providing clear  itineraries with written instructions  on what to do at various destinations)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)
A quiet space is available at the venue/ facility

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are deaf or have hearing loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have a hearing loop
Have TVs with captioning option
Have visual alerts for emergencies (Include flashing light)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth
Use non-slip tiles in the bathroom or slip resistant matting
Have grab rails in the bathroom
Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have lifts with enough space for people using a mobility aid to enter and turn around to use the lift buttons. Buttons are at accessible height.
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room

Have wheelchair accessible transport options available in the general vicinity (provide information on name of the operator, phone and website link to individual providers for private vehicles, community transport train, mini vans, hire cars, buses, taxis, ferry, tram, light rail etc in your access statement)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with high support needs who travel with a support person.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have a bathroom which is fully accessible and equipped with ceiling hoist and adult change table
Have a Changing Places or Lift & Change toilet with a hoist and adult change table
Have a place to store medical equipment (eg oxygen)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.
Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Provide information in large print
Provide digital communication materials (hard copy information is also available on line)
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Have audio enabled lifts
Have raised tactile buttons in your lifts
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

productComments.commentText:
After much anticipation, 14-time Grammy Award-winner Lady Gaga has officially announced the Australian leg of 'The MAYHEM Ball' tour, adding 3 stadium shows to her global tour.

These shows mark Lady Gaga's long-awaited return to the region, and her first dates in Australia since 2014's ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball.

Australian fans can experience 'The MAYHEM Ball' tour in Melbourne, Brisbane and Sydney - arriving at Brisbane's Suncorp Stadium on Tuesday, 9 December 2025.

14회 그래미상을 수상한 레이디 가가가 오랜 기다림 끝에 '메이헴 볼(The MAYHEM Ball)' 투어 호주 투어를 공식 발표했습니다. 글로벌 투어에 3회의 스타디움 공연을 추가한 것입니다.

이번 공연은 레이디 가가의 오랜 기다림 끝에 호주로의 복귀이며, 2014년 '아트레이브: 더 아트팝 볼(ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball)' 이후 첫 호주 공연입니다.

호주 팬들은 멜버른 브리즈번 시드니에서 열리는 '메이헴 볼' 투어를 경험할 수 있으며, 2025년 12월 9일 화요일 브리즈번 선콥 스타디움에 도착합니다.

Dopo grande attesa, la vincitrice di 14 Grammy Award Lady Gaga ha annunciato ufficialmente la tappa australiana del tour "The MAYHEM Ball", aggiungendo 3 concerti negli stadi al suo tour mondiale.

Questi concerti segnano l'attesissimo ritorno di Lady Gaga nella regione e le sue prime date in Australia dall'ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball del 2014.

I fan australiani potranno assistere al tour "The MAYHEM Ball" a Melbourne, Brisbane e Sydney, con arrivo al Suncorp Stadium di Brisbane martedì 9 dicembre 2025.

Mit großer Spannung hat die 14-fache Grammy-Preisträgerin Lady Gaga den australischen Teil ihrer „The MAYHEM Ball“-Tour offiziell angekündigt und ihre Welttournee um drei Stadionkonzerte erweitert.

Diese Konzerte markieren Lady Gagas lang erwartete Rückkehr in die Region und ihre ersten Auftritte in Australien seit dem ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball 2014.

Australische Fans können die „The MAYHEM Ball“-Tour in Melbourne, Brisbane und Sydney erleben – Ankunft im Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane am Dienstag, den 9. Dezember 2025.

經過萬眾期待，14 屆葛萊美獎得主 Lady Gaga 正式宣布「The MAYHEM Ball」巡迴演唱會的澳洲站，為她的全球巡迴演唱會增添 3 場體育場演出。

此次演出標誌著 Lady Gaga 期待已久的重返該地區，也是她自 2014 年 ArtRave：ARTPOP Ball 以來首次在澳洲演出。

澳洲球迷可以在墨爾本、布里斯班和雪梨體驗「The MAYHEM Ball」巡迴演出，並於 2025 年 12 月 9 日星期二抵達布里斯班的 Suncorp 體育場。

14度のグラミー賞受賞を誇るレディー・ガガが、長年の期待を受け、ワールドツアーに3つのスタジアム公演を追加する「ザ・メイヘム・ボール」ツアーのオーストラリア公演を正式に発表しました。

これらの公演は、レディー・ガガにとって待望のオーストラリア復帰となり、2014年の「アートレイブ：ザ・アートポップ・ボール」以来のオーストラリア公演となります。

オーストラリアのファンは、メルボルン、ブリスベン、シドニーで「ザ・メイヘム・ボール」ツアーを体験できます。ブリスベンのサンコープ・スタジアムには、2025年12月9日（火）に到着します。

Tras mucha expectación, Lady Gaga, 14 veces ganadora del Grammy, anunció oficialmente la etapa australiana de su gira "The MAYHEM Ball", añadiendo tres conciertos en estadios a su gira mundial.

Estos conciertos marcan el esperado regreso de Lady Gaga a la región y sus primeras fechas en Australia desde ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball de 2014.

Los fans australianos podrán disfrutar de la gira "The MAYHEM Ball" en Melbourne, Brisbane y Sídney, con llegada al Estadio Suncorp de Brisbane el martes 9 de diciembre de 2025.

Après une longue attente, Lady Gaga, 14 fois lauréate d'un Grammy Award, a officiellement annoncé l'étape australienne de sa tournée « The MAYHEM Ball », ajoutant trois concerts dans des stades à sa tournée mondiale.

Ces concerts marquent le retour tant attendu de Lady Gaga dans la région et ses premières dates en Australie depuis ArtRave : The ARTPOP Ball en 2014.

Les fans australiens pourront découvrir la tournée « The MAYHEM Ball » à Melbourne, Brisbane et Sydney, avec une arrivée au Suncorp Stadium de Brisbane le mardi 9 décembre 2025.

Setelah banyak dinantikan, peraih 14 penghargaan Grammy, Lady Gaga, telah resmi mengumumkan tur 'The MAYHEM Ball' di Australia, dengan menambahkan 3 pertunjukan di stadion ke tur globalnya.

Pertunjukan ini menandai kembalinya Lady Gaga yang telah lama ditunggu-tunggu ke wilayah tersebut, dan konser pertamanya di Australia sejak ArtRave: The ARTPOP Ball tahun 2014.

Penggemar Australia dapat menikmati tur 'The MAYHEM Ball' di Melbourne, Brisbane, dan Sydney - yang akan diselenggarakan di Stadion Suncorp Brisbane pada hari Selasa, 9 Desember 2025.

Após muita expectativa, Lady Gaga, vencedora de 14 prêmios Grammy, anunciou oficialmente a etapa australiana da turnê "The MAYHEM Ball", adicionando três shows em estádios à sua turnê global.

Esses shows marcam o tão aguardado retorno de Lady Gaga à região e seus primeiros shows na Austrália desde a ArtRave de 2014: The ARTPOP Ball.

Os fãs australianos podem curtir a turnê "The MAYHEM Ball" em Melbourne, Brisbane e Sydney, com chegada ao Suncorp Stadium, em Brisbane, na terça-feira, 9 de dezembro de 2025.

经过万众期待，14 次获得格莱美奖的 Lady Gaga 正式宣布了“The MAYHEM Ball”巡回演唱会的澳大利亚站，为她的全球巡回演唱会增加了 3 场体育场演出。

这些演出标志着 Lady Gaga 期待已久的重返该地区，也是她自 2014 年 ArtRave：The ARTPOP Ball 以来首次在澳大利亚演出。

澳大利亚粉丝可以在墨尔本、布里斯班和悉尼体验“The MAYHEM Ball”巡回演唱会 - 将于 2025 年 12 月 9 日星期二抵达布里斯班的 Suncorp 体育场。
